page.title: 19SIXTH FORM LIFE AT AMBLE
page.content: Two years are spent in the{Sixth Form at{Coquet High School}studying{A Level subjects. There is a Sixth Form {Council}which organises various{fund {raising events and activities.}The major fund raising objective this year is aimed towards purchasing a{mini bus for the school. The Sixth Form has a successful{football team,}which plays other local school and staff teams. {Field study centres}are visited as part of the courses in Biology, Geography and Art. Members of the Sixth Form History Department this summer participated in a{Bronze Age {archaeological excavation}in North Northumberland. Last term the Sixth Form held a{sponsored fast}to{raise {money for a water pump}which was sent to a{Third World country}to provide drinking water. Most students further their education at{University.
